name: taskflow
description: Modern task management platform with Next.js, Express, and PostgreSQL
author: Idderf Salem <85516773+slubbles@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npx prisma generate
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy && node src/server.js
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
